PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2002-02872002-02-280,  ,  ,  ,  IA&ND
PrecisAcceptance of a BAND COUNCIL RESOLUTION wherein the CAMPBELL RIVER INDIAN BAND further amends a Surrender affecting its Reserve No. 11 in British Columbia, by withdrawing some 10.93 hectares from the surrendered area in order to render them available for a housing development and for an exchange of lands with the Province (Spit Road).
Attachments
